subject: Data
title: Deepfake Data: AI-Generated Misinformation
description: One-minute skill: Deepfake Data: AI-Generated Misinformation.

hook.text: An AI can generate a fake dataset with realistic statistical properties that passes automated quality checks.

buildup.text: Deepfake data goes beyond images and video â€” entire research datasets can now be fabricated by AI.

discovery.text: Some fabricated papers use AI-generated data that is statistically plausible but never came from real experiments.

twist.text: Detecting fake data is an arms race: as detection improves, generation gets more sophisticated.

climax.text: The trust model of science â€” assuming data is real unless proven otherwise â€” may need a fundamental overhaul.

punchline.text: When fake data looks real, truth needs new defenses.

quiz.question: What is deepfake data?
options: AI-generated fake datasets that appear statistically realistic
